text: The Milk of Sorrow (, The frightened teat) is a 2009 Peruvian Spanish drama movie directed by Claudia Llosa and starring Magaly Solier, Susi Sánchez, Efrain Solís. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2010. ==Other websites== * Category:2009 drama movies Category:Peruvian movies Category:Spanish drama movies
title: The Milk of Sorrow
